name: Void Eclipse
description:
Void Eclipse is turn-based strategy in an immersive sci-fi world that brings a breakthrough blending of 4X empire building with exciting turn-based battle tactics.

A gritty sci-fi tale, full of choices

You're an android with scattered memories in search of your mysterious origins. Explore the stars, Evolve your army and Fight an alien threat. Choose to help characters or harm them - will you be Feared, Admired, or Respected?

Features


  • Explore the galaxy searching for memory fragments as you confront your enemies.
  • Evolve your character's personality matrix and upgrade your battle abilities!
  • Tactical turn-based combat includes over 100 passive & active battle abilities for your characters.
  • Choose dialog options that changes your reputation, what missions to take, and what units to unlock!
  • Comes with 2 playable alien races and 14 unit characters to compose your ultimate battle fleet.



    Your choices have immediate effects but cement a lasting reputation.

    No Micro-transactions

    Unit characters are unlocked through play, and are never purchased. Characters are represented as thumbnails and cards to allow the dark sci-fi illustrations to capture your imagination!
